Title: MangaEpsilon
Description: A manga viewer/downloader. You no longer have to use multiple applications when you can download the latest and view them in MangaEplision. It is written in C#/VB.NET.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A manga viewer/downloader. You no longer have to use multiple applications when you can download the latest and view them in MangaEplision. It is written in C#/VB.NET.

This version has been abandoned. You can find the 2012 revival of the project here: https://github.com/Amrykid/MangaEpsilon

MangaEplision will have the following features:
  • Download the latest manga (for offline storage).
  • Get notified when the chapter is released.
  • View the manga (even offline).
  • Share the manga over twitter.
  • View real time tweets about the manga.
  • Watch videos related to the manga.
  • Distribute the manga to friends using the .mag format (based on ZIP).
